title: Eco-Chic Mountain Duplex with Home Office in Koscielisko
description: Welcome to this modern duplex boasting eco-conscious features and mountain-inspired design. With 3 airy bedrooms, 2 sleek bathrooms, and a flexible home office, this 136 sqm property is tailored for comfort and efficiency. Enjoy abundant natural light, contemporary finishes, and seamless indoor-outdoor flow – your escape in the pristine greenery of Koscielisko.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Koscielisko, Zakopane’s tranquil, low-density western neighborhood, you’re steps from hiking trails and panoramic views of the Tatras. Families and professionals will love the balanced pace amid great access to schools, local culture, and essential amenities, while the close connection to the main highway ensures you’re never far from urban convenience.
lifestyle_benefits: Eco-friendly living in the Tatra foothills
Quick highway access to town and business hubs
target_buyer: Ideal for professionals and families relocating for work seeking a peaceful, modern home that supports sustainable living, with room for a home office.
market_positioning: This property stands out in Zakopane’s market for its blend of sustainable amenities, work-from-home flexibility, security, and easy access to both nature and major transport links.
